name: Hull Mailchimp
description: A Hull Ship for Mailchimp Sync.

MAILCHIMP_CLIENT_ID.description: Mailchimp client ID used to get an access token

MAILCHIMP_CLIENT_SECRET.description: Mailchimp client Secret used to get an access token

PORT.description: Port on which application should listen

SECRET.description: A Secret key used to sign tokens

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level (emerg, alert, crit, error, warning, notice, info, debug)

SHIP_CACHE_MAX.description: Defines what is maximum size of cache

SHIP_CACHE_TTL.description: Defines time to live of cache content that was putted into it
